columns.name: name
columns.description: The DNS name for which Amazon Route 53 responds to queries.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The id that Amazon Route 53 assigned to the new traffic policy instance.

columns.name: hosted_zone_id
columns.description: The id of the hosted zone that Amazon Route 53 created resource record sets in.

columns.name: message
columns.description: If State is Failed, an explanation of the reason for the failure.

columns.name: traffic_policy_id
columns.description: The ID of the traffic policy that Amazon Route 53 used to create resource record sets in the specified hosted zone.

columns.name: traffic_policy_type
columns.description: The DNS type that Amazon Route 53 assigned to all of the resource record sets that it created for this traffic policy instance.

columns.name: traffic_policy_version
columns.description: The version of the traffic policy that Amazon Route 53 used to create resource record sets in the specified hosted zone.

columns.name: ttl
columns.description: The TTL that Amazon Route 53 assigned to all of the resource record sets that it created in the specified hosted zone.
